org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.name: DataEntryStatistics
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.description: Total number of entries per data assistant
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.sqlQuery: select count(distinct encounter_id) TotalFormsEntered, CONCAT(person_name.given_name," ",person_name.family_name) as EnteredBy from encounter left join users on(users.user_id=encounter.creator) left join person_name on(person_name.person_id=users.person_id) left join form on(encounter.form_id=form.form_id) where DATE(encounter.date_created) BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate and encounter.voided=0 GROUP BY encounter.creator;
